subject: Appointments and Executive Changes
Horse Racing
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: As chairman of the New York Racing Association Reorganization Board, David Skorton, president of Cornell University, will be in charge of overseeing new drug rules for horse racing.
snippet: As chairman of the New York Racing Association Reorganization Board, David Skorton, president of Cornell University, will be in charge of overseeing new drug rules for horse racing.
